channel.title: Problems with Whonix Mirrors
channel.description:
The Whonix mirrors are having problems.
The 8.1 directory on the whonix.org mirror sporadically displays incomplete and differing content, and broken links.
http://mirror.whonix.org/8.1/
The other nyud.net mirror is mirroring the incomplete content as well.
http://mirror.whonix.org.nyud.net/8.1/
Maybe a server caching issue?

item.title: Problems with Whonix Mirrors
item.dc:creator: fortasse
item.description:
mirror.whonix.de is up and running, and the download page has been adjusted accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Whonix Mirrors
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
We’re currently not using mirror.whonix.org for anything. We have a problem with HSTS. It’s enforced on all domains. While our mirrors are http-only.

nyud.net can not be used anymore, because they apparently stopped serving files bigger than 50 MB.

To solve the HSTS https/non-https mirror issue we need a separate domain just for downloads and someone who works on communication with mirrors.

Read full topic
